entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
